about_the_game:
An explorer embarks on a perilous journey into an ancient castle in search of a lost treasure. However, as they delve deeper into the castle, mysterious and deadly dangers make survival increasingly difficult. Shadows bring forth knights and ghostly skeletons, relentlessly pursuing the explorer at every step and trying every way to capture them.

Players must use their wit and courage to survive while navigating the dark corridors of the castle. Each new discovery brings both a step closer to danger and the hope of reaching the lost treasure alive.

Key Features:

  • A Thrilling Adventure: A gripping survival challenge set in a mysterious, ancient castle.

  • Dark and Dangerous Foes: Face knights emerging from the shadows and ghostly skeletons as you fight to survive.

  • Hazardous Obstacles: Navigate a journey filled with challenges that require strategic thinking and bravery.

Be prepared! In this dark adventure, you’ll need to rely on your wits and reflexes to survive and claim the treasure.
